productA.name: Tek-Plast AC Plus
productA.description: Tek-Plast AC Plus is a single component acrylic color plaster specially formulated from selected acrylic co-polymers, binders, pigments, sand, admixtures and aggregates. Plastering application on all kinds of internal & external building surfaces.
